author: Brian Melley / AP
title: Los Angeles Mayor Urges Residents to Wear a Mask When They Leave Home
description: Garcetti said people who are performing essential tasks such as food shopping should wear homemade, non-medical face coverings, or even bandannas
content:
(LOS ANGELES) — Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti has recommended that the city’s 4 million people wear masks when going outside amid the spreading coronavirus.
Garcetti on Wednesday said people in the nation’s second-largest city who are performing essential … [+505 chars]
